semantic_identifier: 32: feat: Segment detail: fetch & render segment-scoped positioning templates (read-only)

sections.text:
## Description

This PR wires the Segment Detail view to fetch and display the segment-scoped positioning template via the new positioning-template API.

Key changes:
- Adds a client/service call to request the positioning template for the currently selected segment (keyed by segmentId) and re-fetches on segment change.
- Renders the template sections in the Segment Detail UI: Value Props, Differentiators, Proof Points, and Objections.
- Implements robust UI states:
  - Loading skeleton/spinner while the request is in-flight
  - Empty state messaging when no content is available
  - Error state with retry for failed requests
- Implements fallback behavior: when a segment has no customized template, the UI displays the server-provided default template payload (no client-side defaulting/guessing).
- Read-only presentation only (no editing controls or save flows), enabling follow-up PRs to layer inline editing.

Notes for reviewers:
- Focus is on correctness and resilience (high priority): request cancellation/cleanup on segment change, minimal re-renders, and defensive handling of partial section data.
- No schema changes; all content is driven by the API response.

## How Has This Been Tested?
